code: import React from'react';import{Stack,Typography}from'@mui/material';import Icon from'../assets/icons/gym.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BodyPart=_ref=>{let{item,setBodyPart,bodyPart}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{type:"button",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",className:"bodyPart-card",sx:{borderTop:bodyPart===item?'4px solid #ff2625':'',backgroundColor:'#2b2b2b',color:'#e0e0e0',borderBottomLeftRadius:'20px',width:'200px',height:'280px',cursor:'pointer',gap:'47px',boxShadow:'0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)',transition:'background-color 0.3s','&:hover':{backgroundColor:'#3b3b3b'}},onClick:()=>{setBodyPart(item);window.scrollTo({top:1800,left:100,behavior:'smooth'});},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Icon,alt:"dumbbell",className:"icon-animation",style:{width:'40px',height:'40px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{fontSize:"20px",fontWeight:"bold",fontFamily:"Alegreya",color:"#e0e0e0",textTransform:"capitalize",children:item})]});};export default BodyPart;
